senses.sense_definition: A famous archaeological site of the Maya civilization located in Chiapas, Mexico, or one of several towns in Latin America.

examples.text: Tourists travel from all over the world to see the ancient pyramids of <w>Palenque</w>.
The inscriptions found at <w>Palenque</w> have provided key insights into Maya history.

senses.sense_definition: A community or fortified settlement established by runaway slaves in Latin America.

examples.text: The escaped slaves built a <w>palenque</w> in the mountains to defend their freedom.
Life in a <w>palenque</w> was organized around communal defense and agriculture.
